sentences.en: -- With all his own might , and the fiend's!
sentences.cn: 竭尽 他自己的, 以及魔鬼的全力!

sentences.en: A tearful husband repeated calls for help in catching the fiend who battered his wife.
sentences.cn: 泪流满面的丈夫再三呼吁协助抓住殴打他妻子的那个恶棍。

sentences.en: And that he knew it was a Fiend, This miserable Knight!
sentences.cn: 可是他知道这是个魔王, 我们这不幸的骑士!

sentences.en: Be that word our sign of parting, bird or fiend!
sentences.cn: 让这话做我们的造别之辞, 鸟或魔!

sentences.en: Come on with your good fiend, and participate in forestry centre driftage.
sentences.cn: 来吧,带上您的亲朋好友, 参加林区漂流.

sentences.en: He is a fiend at tennis.
He is a fresh - air fiend.
sentences.cn: 他是个喜爱户外生活的人.

sentences.en: Hi, Tom! I'd like you to meet my fiend, Sal.
sentences.cn: 嗨, 汤姆. 我想请你见见我的朋友莎儿.

sentences.en: I often go round to my fiend on holiday.
sentences.cn: 假期里我经常去看望朋友.

sentences.en: It was said , that ghost and fiend consorted with him there.
sentences.cn: 据说魔鬼在那儿与他相会.

sentences.en: Like the morphine fiend , he was becoming addicted to his ease.
sentences.cn: 就像吗啡鬼一样, 他对贪图安乐上了瘾.

sentences.en: Monkey recognized it and struck it again. Like the first time, the fiend fled.
sentences.cn: 悟空认出又是白骨精变的,举棒又打,白骨精故伎重演, 化烟脱逃.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is more a fiend than a teacher.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生与其说是老师,倒不如说是我们的朋友.

sentences.en: Or am I given over utterly to the fiend?
sentences.cn: 还是我让魔鬼完全控制了?

sentences.en: The recent development fiend in international diamond wire saw was described.
sentences.cn: 阐述最近国际金刚石串珠绳锯的发展趋势.

sentences.en: Who is this terribly ugly fiend who so rudely intervened?
sentences.cn: “这可怕丑陋的怪物是谁?”,“是谁如此粗鲁突然介入? ”

words.tran_cn: 恶魔似的，残忍的；极坏的
